Title: The Yellow King - Part I
Descriptions: Hans: You've gotta help me. I was put in here by some bandit group. They took the key with them and they only come by every few days to feed me and keep me alive. I don't know what they want with me, but I've been here for weeks. Please get me out of here! These bars are made of pure steel, nothing can cut through them - believe me, I've tried. Maybe Sebastian at Sanctuary will have an idea who these guys are? He seems to know everyone in Livonia. The leader of the group wears a yellow helmet with spikes all over it. I bet Sebastian will know who he is. Please hurry!
